response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $14,000 for this product. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
